item.title: My First Post
item.description: Albony’s First Blog Post Search Privately using Whoogle. What is whoogle ? Whoogle is a privacy friendly (meta) search engine. It uses google for it’s data but without any ads, javascript, AMP links, cookies, or IP address tracking. It’s Free and opensource software. ![[whoogle.png]] Why use whoogle? If you didn’t knew, a great chunk of google’s revenue comes from ads and tracking. They use their services to gather user’s private data and use it for their own benefit, privacy is extremely important.
